title: What will you accomplish today?
placeholder: Describe a task and let AI handle the rest

consultarCodigo.title: Search Legal Code
consultarCodigo.description: Search articles from Civil, Penal, Consumer codes and more.
consultarCodigo.prompt: Search for article 121 of the Penal Code and explain its content.

pesquisarLei.title: Search Law
pesquisarLei.description: Search federal laws by number and year.
pesquisarLei.prompt: Search for Law 8.078/90 (Consumer Defense Code) and list the main consumer rights.

buscarSumula.title: Search Precedent
buscarSumula.description: Search precedents from STF, STJ or TST courts.
buscarSumula.prompt: Search for Precedent 37 from STJ about moral damages and explain its application.

consultarProcesso.title: Search Case
consultarProcesso.description: Search court cases by NPU number.
consultarProcesso.prompt: Search for case 1000000-00.2024.8.26.0100 at TJSP and list the latest movements.

buscarJurisprudencia.title: Search Case Law
buscarJurisprudencia.prompt: Search case law about moral damages for improper credit denial at STJ.

validarDocumento.title: Validate CPF/CNPJ
validarDocumento.prompt: Validate CNPJ 00.000.000/0001-91 and search company data at Federal Revenue.

consultarCep.title: Search ZIP Code
consultarCep.description: Search full address by ZIP code.
consultarCep.prompt: Search the address for ZIP code 01310-100 and provide street, neighborhood and city.

analisarPeca.title: Analyze Legal Document
analisarPeca.description: Extract information from petitions and documents.
analisarPeca.prompt: Analyze the initial petition and identify parties, claims and legal grounds.

extrairClausulas.title: Extract Clauses
extrairClausulas.prompt: Extract termination and penalty clauses from the contract and summarize key points.

dataJud.title: DataJud
dataJud.description: Search court cases in the CNJ system.
